The thigh muscle tends active knee osteoarthritis , may make difficult strengthen muscle . The investigator also test new technology call repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) determine whether may help `` turn '' activity active thigh muscle immediately application . rTMS us target pulsed magnetic field , similar use MRI ( magnetic resonance imaging ) machine send electrical signal brain thigh muscle .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Effects rTMS Excitability Quadriceps With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator recruit 20 people symptomatic knee osteoarthritis . The 20 eligible participant attend 3 session laboratory . Session 1 collect data Aim 1 . Sessions 2 3 include rTMS intervention data collection Aim 2 . Aim 1 descriptive study compare neural ( cortical corticospinal ) excitability quadriceps symptomatic knee asymptomatic knee participant knee osteoarthritis . The investigator examine association neural excitability clinical measure pain , strength , function , cop style . Aim 2 double blind , crossover study design . Each participant partake two testing session , space 1 week apart . The investigator evaluate outcome measure prior follow `` true '' intervention versus `` sham '' intervention . The true intervention rTMS + exercise . The sham sham rTMS + exercise . The primary outcome measure quadriceps strength , measure maximal isometric voluntary contraction , quadriceps activation percent , calculate torque value voluntary strength measurement brief , intense electrical stimulus . Secondary measure evaluate effect intervention 1 ) clinical measure pain functional performance , 2 ) corticospinal excitability , 3 ) intracortical inhibition facilitation .
DOC.criteria: symptomatic knee osteoarthritis primarily involve one leg base Western Ontario McMaster Universities Arthritis Index ( WOMAC ) function subscale score > 21 ( 100 point , indicate dysfunction ) knee osteoarthritis 2 4 , base Kellgren Lawrence scale . opposite knee WOMAC pain score ≤ 5. opposite knee score ≤ 2 KellgrenLawrence scale . condition affect leg osteoarthritis ; condition limit exercise tolerance heart condition pregnant planning become pregnant next 3 month condition alter sensation pain processing ; BMI > 35 severe arthritis knee history leg back surgery past year knee replacement surgery ; injection knee joint past 4 week require assistive device walk contraindication TMS rTMS ( seizure , metal implant head , brain related condition , brain injury , drug alcohol withdrawal ) medication low seizure threshold history fainting spell ( syncope ) low blood pressure sleep deprive inability understand repeat back direction regard study
